languages.text: {n}Да, нити их еще не прерваны. С удивлением я понимаю, что они стоят совсем рядом. Огнеголосый яростно устыжает тех, кто совсем недавно готовился поднять мятеж. Стальная госпожа гремит сиреной, сыпет обещаниями наказаний и потрясает булавой. Сейчас они бесполезны для охоты.{/n}

{n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Да, нити их еще не прерваны. С удивлением я понимаю, что они стоят совсем рядом. Огнеголосый яростно устыжает тех, кто совсем недавно готовился поднять мятеж. Стальная госпожа гремит сиреной, сыпет обещаниями наказаний и потрясает булавой. Сейчас они бесполезны для охоты.{/n}

{n}No, their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing very close to each other. Flaming Heart is furiously shaming those who had only recently been preparing to revolt. Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}

{n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. languages.text: {n}Ihre Fäden wurden noch nicht durchtrennt. Ich erkenne erstaunt, dass sie nahe bei mir stehen. Flammende Stimme tadelt wütend alle, die sich erst kürzlich der Revolte angeschlossen hatten, während Stahlherrin wie eine Sirene ihren Streitkolben schwingt und mit Bestrafung droht. Sie sind jetzt nutzlos für die Jagd.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Fäden wurden noch nicht durchtrennt. Ich erkenne erstaunt, dass sie nahe bei mir stehen. Flammende Stimme tadelt wütend alle, die sich erst kürzlich der Revolte angeschlossen hatten, während Stahlherrin wie eine Sirene ihren Streitkolben schwingt und mit Bestrafung droht. Sie sind jetzt nutzlos für die Jagd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sus hilos aún no están cortados. Comprendo con sorpresa que están cerca de mí. Voz Llameante condena con furia a todos los que acababan de unirse a la revuelta, mientras Señora de Acero resuena como una sirena, agitando su maza y amenazando con un castigo. Ahora son inútiles para la cacería.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus hilos aún no están cortados. Comprendo con sorpresa que están cerca de mí. Voz Llameante condena con furia a todos los que acababan de unirse a la revuelta, mientras Señora de Acero resuena como una sirena, agitando su maza y amenazando con un castigo. Ahora son inútiles para la cacería.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らの糸はまだ切られていない。彼らが近くに立っていることに、驚いてハッとした。燃える声は最近反乱に加わった者たちを強くなじり、スティール・ミストレスはサイレンのような大声をあげ、鉄槌を振りながら罰を与えると凄んでいる。彼らはもう、狩りで使える状態ではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らの糸はまだ切られていない。彼らが近くに立っていることに、驚いてハッとした。燃える声は最近反乱に加わった者たちを強くなじり、スティール・ミストレスはサイレンのような大声をあげ、鉄槌を振りながら罰を与えると凄んでいる。彼らはもう、狩りで使える状態ではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们的丝线并没有断裂。我惊愕地发现，他们此刻就在我身边。“烈焰之声”正在怒斥刚刚所有参与暴乱的人，而“钢铁女士”像海怪一样咆哮着，挥舞着她的战锤，威胁要惩罚他们。这场狩猎已经不再需要这两个人了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们的丝线并没有断裂。我惊愕地发现，他们此刻就在我身边。“烈焰之声”正在怒斥刚刚所有参与暴乱的人，而“钢铁女士”像海怪一样咆哮着，挥舞着她的战锤，威胁要惩罚他们。这场狩猎已经不再需要这两个人了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leurs fils n'ont pas encore été tranchés. Je réalise avec stupéfaction qu'ils se tiennent près de moi. Timbre flamboyant adresse des reproches furieux à tous les révoltés tardifs, tandis que Maîtresse d'acier hurle comme une sirène menaçant quiconque de punition avec son maillet. Ils n'ont plus aucun rôle à jouer dans la chasse, à présent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İplikleri henüz kesilmedi. Şaşkınlıkla ne denli yakınımda olduklarının farkına varıyorum. Alazlı Ses, ayaklanmaya daha yeni katılanları öfkeyle azarlıyor. Çelikten Hanım ise siren misali çığırıyor. Tokmağını sallayarak cezalandırmayla tehdit ediyor. Artık ava hiçbir faydaları yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their threads have not yet been cut. I realise with astonishment that they are standing close to me. Flaming Voice is furiously reproaching all those who had only recently joined the revolt, while Steel Mistress booms like a siren, shaking her maul and threatening punishment. They are useless to the hunt now.{/n}
